timeline.message:
Make HelixCustomCodeRunner multi-ZK aware

This class was an edge case that was neglected as part of ZooScalability API migration. This commit makes HelixCustomCodeRunner realm-aware by adding a constructor that accepts a RealmAwareZkConnectionConfig.

timeline.bodyText: if zkaddress is null and we are initialize it with FederatedZKClient, do we have problem? For example, we cannot get the routing key and cause any problems?
timeline.author: junkaixue

replies.bodyText: The whole point of FederatedZkClient is not using a particular ZkAddress, but rather rely on RealmAwareConnectionConfig to establish a multi-zk connection, so this makes sense. The sharding key information is included in the connection config.
replies.author: narendly
